title: iPad Pro (2020) review: beyond the trackpad
description: Dieter Bohn reviews Apples new iPad Pro tablets for 2020. There are minor updates this year, with a new wide-angle camera, support for a trackpad, and LiDAR for augmented reality. Theres more than enough hardware power for nearly anybody here, but is there a reason to upgrade?  Read the full review here:   Vox Media has affiliate partnerships.
